Name: PvZ2_Preprelease_NMT_P4

Updates.zh: 加入炫光魔音游僵尸博士

Updates.en: **The author has his own plan to design the Kongfu Temple world, needless of guidance.**
Updates.zh: **作者对武林寺庙世界已经有规划，不需要指导。**

NewFeatures: 加入炫光魔音游僵尸博士
补充现代34炫光魔音僵尸博士，纠正现代34侏罗纪僵尸博士血量
完善炫光魔音游僵尸博士图层分配，以及解决魅惑障碍物问题
修复骆驼牌和法老原地不动、溅射范围错误等问题
EnNewFeatures: Added Modern 34 Zombot Multi-stage Masher, corrected Modern 34 Jurassic Zombot Multi-stage Masher HP.
Improved Zombot Multi-stage Masher layering and solved the problem of charming obstacles.
Fixed the problems of Camel and Pharaoh not moving and incorrect splash range.
